about.description:
BFBAN

created at 2018.1.29; It is an organisation created to fight against hackers

Staff members in bfban include:

  • Server owners
  • Clan's leaders
  • Bf1 streamers
about.privacy:
Privacy policy

It is open-sourced. You can post issues and suggest changes/improvements via GitHub. The API is provided by the community network and is open for public use.
about.title: About
about.website:
bfban.com website

bfban.com relies on bfban Bureau of Investigations, the original idea originated from enthusiastic players, it is developed by mygoare and launched on November 4, 2018

Bfban is mainly used to report players and discuss if a player is a hacker or not.

bindOrigin.content: BfBan requires you to connect your Origin account in order to appeal. Your account will be locked and you will not be able to submit anything if you dont connect your Orgin first.
bindOrigin.title: This account not connected to a Origin account!
bindOrigin.travel: All right, Connect to my Origin account

hint.taOffChat: This User has turned off the chat option

antiCheat.intro: The BFBAN team's standards for handling different cases are up to date
antiCheat.name: BFBAN Anti Cheat Rule

conduct.intro: Code of conduct for BFBAN team members in their daily work
conduct.name: BFBAN Code of Conduct (CoC)

personnel.intro: Recruitment rules for the BFBAN team, the structure of the members and the rights and obligations and requirements of the different members are explained
personnel.name: BFBAN Personnel Rule

apps.describe: Third-party integration of BFBAN database tools
apps.title: Tools

discuss.describe: More discussion bettween admins and player is needed, currently uncertain.

farm.describe: Submit a gun record to clean the actual hammer due to weapon data anomalies

guilt.describe: A admin has judged that player is a cheater. The result will be pubished when more admins enter the vote.

innocent.describe: Cleared by way of video of reported information.

invalid.describe: Invild evidence or wrong player ID

kill.describe: admins think this player is a comfirmed cheater.

suspect.describe: The information provided is insuffient to justify that player is cheating. However, there is still unordinary activity lies inside it. The player status will be changed to comfirmed cheater if more evidence is provided.

tip.notFound: We cant find the page your looking for.

messages.bad: Error while binding, please contact admin
messages.expired: Verification code for binding expired, please bind again
messages.notFound: Verification code for binding not found

attackServer.describe: Attack battlefield server using method such as DDOS attack
attackServer.title: Attacking server

gadgetModify.describe: Gadget appears in scenario that is impossible
gadgetModify.title: Gadget Modify

magicBullet.describe: Bullet can be shot through wall, structure or terrain.
magicBullet.title: Magical bullet

oneShotKill.describe: Quickly aim to body part that deal high damge to achive instant kill
oneShotKill.title: Insta-kill

wallhack.describe: View enemy position though wall, structure or terrain
wallhack.title: Wallhack

appeal.describe: This report has a problem. I can prove that me or the player mentioned is innocent.

auxiliaryProof.1: Other players (enemy and friendly) perspectives of the reported single battle, and no less than 10 minutes without clips, provide the video address by yourself.
auxiliaryProof.2: Players present, provide their own id, specific server, time, venue, and the description of your auxiliary appeal object.
auxiliaryProof.title: Auxiliary proof

modal.describe: For wrong BAN, you or a third party can assist in the appeal. After meeting all the basic requirements below, your appeal content will be submitted to all administrators of BFBAN, and the administrator can only release it after confirmation

effectiveEvidence.1: Use software like "High Speed Target Bullseye" and Moss software to capture the screen, hands, and keyboard to record self-certification.
effectiveEvidence.2: Self-defense, you can use pictures, videos and other materials.
effectiveEvidence.3: Some places provide different requirements, you can consult the regional BFBAN management and ask for appeal materials.
effectiveEvidence.title: Valid evidence

evidenceInvalid.1: Lending, leasing, etc. to a third party, no matter whether it is swiping data or borrowing words from friends, cannot prove whether it is the person. You must understand that the account lending method cannot be known through any means. It will not be approved.
evidenceInvalid.2: Intercepted and used by multiple players (not limited to my own screenshot showing cheating features) or buying cheating software multimedia.
evidenceInvalid.3: If there is a criminal record, players with files in the above series will greatly discount the chances of passing.
evidenceInvalid.title: Proof of failure

placeholder.content: Please fill in detail of your appeal for review

info.adminManual1: Do not judge lightly. If you are not certain, please use the reply function above and waiting for more evidence
info.adminManual2: any action here by admin will make a status change for this reported playerÔºåIf you are not 100% confirmed, please use reply function above

app_qr.openAppDescribe: View this player on the BfBan App
app_qr.tip: Scan this QR to open in the BfBan App
app_qr.title: View on mobile app

info.appealManual1: Ban Appeals: Please send this case's web page link and appealing to ban-appeals@bfban.com.
info.discription1: If you cant find the player on battlefieldtracker or you think he changed Origin account name,please Click
info.discription2: bfban.com can track hackers' newest ID
info.discription3: Server can update hacker who is on the list periodically
info.discription4: Historical ID which they used before can be found too

fastReplies.evidencePic: As the evidence showed in the picture
fastReplies.evidenceVid: As the evidence showed in the video

info.replyManual1: If you have new picture or video evidence to be maintained, you can report one more time.Otherwise,you can only reply text or link by replying here.if you want to add picture click here
info.replyManual2: and then copy the picture link to reply
info.replyManual3: You must be a BFban member to take part in the disscusion
info.replyManual4: You must log in to reply

appropriateVerdict.1: Intuitively put forward the reasons for the ruling, for example, a certain behavior determines the result of the judgment due to the following factors (omitted)
appropriateVerdict.2: Brief, with obvious cheating features, you can use the template below to make a unified judgment
appropriateVerdict.title: Appropriate verdict

inappropriateRuling.1: Fill in meaningless replies such as "1", "[space character]", "[expression]", etc
inappropriateRuling.2: Replies contain personal attacks, discrimination, pornography, and political content
inappropriateRuling.3: Due to factors outside the game, such as avatar, ugly
inappropriateRuling.title: An inappropriate ruling

messages.tipBind: Please bind your Origin ID before replay

modifyName.residueDegree: You still have {changeNameLeft}chance to change name
modifyName.specification1: You are changing your account name, which means that you will see changes within the site and the login ID will change at the same time. If you accidentally forget your new account ID, you may not be able to retrieve it, affecting your binded orgin account, and you will need to go through a very long manual review..
modifyName.specification2: Do you understand the instructions above?
modifyName.title: Change name

toNormals.describe: Send message to all normal users

exportAndImport.description: The local persistent data will not be synchronized with the cloud, and you need to manually export and import the data on the new platform. Of course, these data leaks will not affect your account security, but they contain some records
exportAndImport.hint1: Do not import data into unfamiliar environments, the exported content contains some of your local private information
exportAndImport.hint2: Proceed with caution, overwriting cannot be undone
exportAndImport.title: Export and import

voice.interactionDescribe: Some interactive voices on the website
voice.messageDescribe: Notification sounds related to in-site messages
voice.title: Sound

info.description: List as much evidence as possible about the person being reported
info.idNotion1: You can only report one ID at a timeÔºå do not include the platoon name and do not fill in your own ID
info.idNotion2: Origin name has no match for lower case and upper caseÔºåbut you must identify i I 1 l L o O 0 in order to offer correct ID
info.loginExpired: Your login has expired, please re-login.
info.notFoundHintAnswer1: Please visit origin.com to search that player. If this player can be found but the report can't be made, you can send us bug report via the contact methods on the bottom of the frontpage.
info.notFoundHintAnswer2: That is probably because EA didnot update their database in timeÔºåor their system bugged, and we are unable to help them fix that bug. If you do wish to help, you can visit       https://answers.ea.com/t5/Origin-Client-Web-Technical/bd-p/origin-technical-issues-en       , the official froum to send bug reportÔºåyou can describe this situation as: I can't search my friend by name on origin.
info.notFoundHintQuestion1: But I've just met him in game/I can find him on battlefield tracker?
info.notFoundHintQuestion2: I can't find him on origin, what can I do?
info.onlyOneId: Only one origin account at a time
info.uploadManual1: if you do not want to register video-site member such as Bilibili and Youtube, you can go to
info.uploadManual2: and then paste the video link below
info.uploadManual3: you can offer your video by Bilibili,Youtube,Youku,Tudou and more
info.uploadPic1: We recommend you to upload pictures with png, jpg, jpeg, gif format.
info.uploadPic2: picture larger than 2M will fail to upload ,you can go to
info.uploadPic3: and then choose Image URL TagÔºåpaste the image link below
info.uploadPic4: please list your evidence hereÔºåText editor offer image upload serviceÔºàSize limits:2MÔºâ
